title: Die fast vergessene Welt
description: Palaeontologist Rick Marshall takes Will and Holly into a new world of danger, dinosaurs and big bug-eyed lizard people while trying to find their way back home and, too, save the universe and in doing so saving his reputation. With the dinosaur with brains, brawn and personality and the adventure of scientific advancement and exotic beasts in a far away land, it all adds up to time traveling fun and frolics. Written by Cinema_Fan
castList: [Will Ferrell, Anna Friel, Danny McBride, Jorma Taccone, John Boylan, Matt Lauer, Bobb'e J. Thompson, Sierra McCormick, Shannon Lemke, Stevie Wash Jr., Brian Huskey, Kevin Buitrago, Noah Crawford, Jon Kent Ethridge, Logan Manus]
characterList: [Dr. Rick Marshall, Holly Cantrell, Will Stanton, Chaka, Enik, Matt Lauer, Tar Pits Kid, Tar Pits Kid, Tar Pits Kid, Tar Pits Kid (as Steven Wash Jr.), Teacher, Teenager, Teenager, Teenager (as Jon Kent Ethridge II), Teenager]
